summary: Ralph Rexford Bellamy  was an American movie, television, stage, voice, radio actor, and comedian.
full_text: Ralph Rexford Bellamy  was an American actor whose career spanned 62 years on stage, screen and television. During his career, he played leading roles as well as supporting roles, garnering acclaim and awards, including an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor for The Awful Truth .
title: Ralph Bellamy
